content: Further down the main path, you’ll find a large terrace overlooking a ravine below where the black tornado swirls. Guarding this spot is a bolstered Rat Governor, who uses deadly lightning attacks (and can even create temporary copies of himself for added damage!) you’ll want to shut down by Immobilizing him. Defeat this stronger foe, and you’ll be able to absorb the Rat Governor Spirit to perform your own electric attack!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fright_Cliff_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Fright Cliff Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Rock Clash Platform'.
The content is as follows:
Further down the main path, you’ll find a large terrace overlooking a ravine below where the black tornado swirls. Guarding this spot is a bolstered Rat Governor, who uses deadly lightning attacks (and can even create temporary copies of himself for added damage!) you’ll want to shut down by Immobilizing him. Defeat this stronger foe, and you’ll be able to absorb the Rat Governor Spirit to perform your own electric attack!
